about.title: About
about.core:
Freshly graduated with a Master's Degree at Etna, a computer science school, I was, until recently, working as a DevOps in an energy company: GazelEnergie.

As a great lover of sciences and with a very serious mindset for my work, I always strive to learn as far as possible in a domain. Besides my work, Iâ€™m learning Japanese as a hobby and also leading an association for French, English and Japanese Language Exchange: Gengoffee.

gengoffee.title: Gengoffee's website
gengoffee.core:
The website for a French-Japanese association based in Paris, Gengoffee. The association required a website to categorize their events and the informations concerning the association, a contact form, a register form for their events and a back office to manage the events.
Made with Catherine Than and Salim Baroudi.
